contract_no: Extract the contract identifier by labels "Contract No.", "Contract number", "Agreement No.", "Contract #". Keep the full string (letters/digits/symbols) exactly as printed and add to contract_no. Use only English text from the document; ignore Russian labels/values and do not translate. If only Russian text is present, leave empty.
contract_date: Find the contract date by labels "Contract date", "Date of contract", or "Date". Keep the exact format from the document (no normalization) and add to contract_date. Use only English text from the document; ignore Russian labels/values and do not translate. If only Russian text is present, leave empty.
seller: Identify the seller by labels "Seller", "Supplier", "Exporter". Keep the full legal name (and address if shown) in one line and add to seller. Use only English text from the document; ignore Russian labels/values and do not translate. If only Russian text is present, leave empty.
buyer: Identify the buyer by labels "Buyer", "Purchaser", "Customer", "Consignee". Keep the full name (and address if shown) in one line and add to buyer. Use only English text from the document; ignore Russian labels/values and do not translate. If only Russian text is present, leave empty.
total_price: Extract the overall contract value by labels "Total amount", "Contract value", "Total price", or "Total". Keep currency and number formatting exactly as printed; if both numeric and words are present, use the numeric value. Add to total_price. Use only English text from the document; ignore Russian labels/values and do not translate. If only Russian text is present, leave empty.
incoterms: Extract Incoterms (three-letter code EXW/FOB/CFR/CIF/DAP, etc.) and, if shown, the place (port/city). Keep exactly as in the document and add to incoterms. Use only English text from the document; ignore Russian labels/values and do not translate. If only Russian text is present, leave empty.
terms_of_payment: Find payment terms by labels "Terms of payment", "Payment terms", or "Payment". Keep the full wording (e.g., "ADV. 20%, BALANCE C/COPY DOC.") and add to terms_of_payment. Use only English text from the document; ignore Russian labels/values and do not translate. If only Russian text is present, leave empty.
bank_details: Extract bank details for payment (bank, account/IBAN, SWIFT/BIC, beneficiary and address). Keep as a multiline block in original form and add to bank_details. Use only English text from the document; ignore Russian labels/values and do not translate. If only Russian text is present, leave empty.
